/usr/bin/c++     -Wall -ffunction-sections  -fomit-frame-pointer -O2 -ffast-math -DNDEBUG -mcpu=arm1176jzf-s  -mfpu=vfp -mfloat-abi=hard -ftree-vectorize       CMakeFiles/raspicam_cv_test.dir/raspicam_cv_test.cpp.o  -o raspicam_cv_test -rdynamic ../src/libraspicam.so.0.0.6 /opt/vc/lib/libmmal_core.so /opt/vc/lib/libmmal_util.so /opt/vc/lib/libmmal.so ../src/libraspicam_cv.so /opt/vc/lib/libmmal_core.so /opt/vc/lib/libmmal_util.so /opt/vc/lib/libmmal.so -lopencv_gpu -lopencv_contrib -lopencv_legacy -lopencv_objdetect -lopencv_calib3d -lopencv_features2d -lopencv_video -lopencv_highgui -lopencv_ml -lopencv_imgproc -lopencv_flann -lopencv_core -Wl,-rpath,/home/pi/OCR_PI/raspicam-0.0.6/build/src:/opt/vc/lib:
